Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
TENSIONS RISE ON CAPELLAN-TERRAN BORDER!


Capolla, [[DM.Factions[faction_Cameron],Terran Hegemony]]: Political tensions are on the rise along the border between the [[DM.Factions[faction_Liao],Capellan Confederation]] and the [[DM.Factions[faction_Cameron],Terran Hegemony]], with several worlds agitating for or against each nation. On Capolla, there is a small but growing pro-Liao sentiment that may bubble over into open conflict, as local Hegemony troops try to put down increasingly discontented locals. Meanwhile across the border on Zurich, several major noble houses have made public calls to leave the Confederation and join the Hegemony, citing the reduction of favorable trade agreements under Chancellor [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSunTzuLiao],Sun-Tzu Liao]]. The Chancellor has responded by ordering Warrior House Dai Da Chi to the world in order to pacify the noble houses, which are accused of rebelling against the state.


Would you like to know more?

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
ERIDANI CIVIL WAR HEATS UP


The long-running civil war on Epsilon Eridani has entered another phase with the planet's Palatine of Duvic hiring of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKingstonK],Kingston's Killers]] and [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreThe48th],The 48th]] mercenary companies.  While both units are small, they threaten to tip the balance in favour of the Palatine over their the County Shu planetary militia opponents.


BRUTAL FIVE SIDED FIGHTING ON CAPH


The collapse of the planet's goverment in the wake of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreOpGuerrero],Operation GUERRERO]] has left factions obstensibly representing each of the Great Houses and the Word of Blake battling for control of the planet.  Identified units embroiled in this conflict include [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGustafsonGren],Gustafson's Grenadiers]], the Denebola [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSMM],SMM]], [[DM.Factions[faction_LindonsBattalion],Lindon's Battalion]], the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreStealthyTigers],Stealthy Tigers]] and the [[DM.Factions[faction_AlwaysFaithful],Always Faithful]].


Attack and defence contracts for these [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreChaosMarch],Chaos March]] battlefields are available via the MRBC database.
